channel.title: The Dawn and Drew Show!
channel.itunes:author: Dawn Miceli and Drew Domkus
channel.description:
two ex gutter punks fall in love, buy a retired farm in wisconsin and tell the world their dirty secrets... always profane, rarely profound.
podcasting since september of 2004, we were one of the first. still going strong after all these years, and there's still no format to our nonsense.
we produce 3-5 shows a week including fun adventures in video that we like to call Dawn and Drew TV!
channel.itunes:subtitle: listen up bitches!
channel.itunes:summary: two ex gutter punks fall in love, buy a retired farm in wisconsin and tell the world their dirty secrets... always profane, rarely profound.
channel.itunes:keywords: dawn and drew, married couple, wisconsin

item.title: DNDS-888
item.itunes:author: Dawn Miceli and Drew Domkus
item.description:
DNDS-888 - part 2 of the big california trip / drew's sick show. we continue with adventures at disneyland, nataly's 30th birthday party, apartment door break ins, traveling back home, and then spending time in the hospital after a near death experience. here's the deal with drew: they said it's CMV (Cytomegalovirus). i caught a virus that woke up some mono i had a long time ago. so as my body was having daily fevers to battle it, it was also killing off my blood platelets, which got down to as low as 5k when they should be above 150k. it was caught just in time really, disneyland could have been a real nightmare.
